"The Options Screen":
"Options

Change a variety of settings, including display and control settings. If the game runs too slow (the screen often stutters or stops), turn off the various graphics options under 'Graphic Settings' to improve performance.

Control Settings lets you assign different functions to each mouse/gamepad button and keyboard key to customize the control method you prefer.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_menu_mmenu_option>"
